alert.note: Alert for Caswell; Rockingham; Stokes; Surry; Wilkes; Yadkin (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 07 at 8:05AM EST until February 07 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...A wintry mixture of freezing rain and sleet is likely this morning. A light glaze of ice is expected in addition to a light accumulation of sleet. * WHERE...Portions of south central Virginia and north central and northwest North Carolina. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. ET
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow...sleet...or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Be prepared for slippery roads and limited visibilities...and use caution while driving. Please report snow, sleet or ice accumulations via email at rnk.skywarn@noaa.gov or by calling the National Weather Service toll free at...1...866...2 1 5...4 3 2 4. Leave a message with your observation and the specific location where it occurred. You can also post your report to National Weather Service Blacksburg Facebook page and on Twitter. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Caswell; Rockingham; Stokes; Surry; Wilkes; Yadkin
